::Zardus::

Zardus nods at Mortem's explanation. "That data should include that, 
yes."

He waits for them to finish, then listens to Mortem's thanks. "You're 
welcome. I have no more hesitation about helping the Predacon council 
than other Predacons do. But who is on your most-wanted list? I might 
have information about them."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Mortem made her way through the information of the Allience 
Computer. 
> Tal-X interfaced and copied all the data provided for them. Then, 
hearing 
> Zardus' question she turned to him.
>        "What I need to know is the location of each ship, base, 
fortress, or 
> command post used by all transformers on this planet. It is 
essential that I 
> make a census of them all for the Predacon High Command on 
Cybertron. Also, I 
> want the bots on my most wanted list. If I can capture them and 
bring them to 
> Predacon justice then my entire mission will be successful."
>        Tal finished with the computer and awaited further 
instructions from 
> the Ambassador. His large body rested a minute going over the data 
he just 
> copied.
>        She continued to talk with Zardus. "Commander, I want to 
thank you for 
> letting us use your facilities. I think thats all I need from 
you..." She 
> trailed off for a moment thinking if she needed anything 
else. "Thank you for 
> your cooperation."
